sentence.Network_en: Only since 1962 has the show been held biannually.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个展会自1962年才开始一年举办两届。

sentence.Network_en: We hold our big sale biannually.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们半年进行一次大减价.
